name: 8ft. - Spider Simulator
description:
Controls

  • WASD Moves
  • Spacebar Jumps
  • Right Mouse Button to Aim
  • Left Mouse Button Shoots Web & Attaches it
  • Esc returns to level selection (might have to press it twice)

The game was created as a student project:

  • Niilo Kajala - Art, VFX
  • Hannu Timonen - Art, Texturing, Sounds
  • Janika Keskitalo - Art, Animations
  • Eppu Syyrakki & Laura Huovinen - Programming

Procedural IK Spider by Philipp Schofield - https://github.com/PhilS94/Unity-Procedural-IK-Wall-Walking-Spider

P.S. It's a 100MB game, if it fails to load a level try refreshing the page.
